Nice modern rooms with good air con, even had a pc outside the hotel room with free internet access to keep up to date with the football news!!! Great value as well - get it booked at the Marcella Royal!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - and very good staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have just returned from a week at the Marcella Royal and would definitely recommend it. The staff were unfailingly courteous and helpful, and provided useful, sensible advice. The hotel is in a good quiet location and is only a short bus ride from whatever you might want to visit if you really can't be bothered to walk. We purposely chose this set-up rather than a noiser location closer in - Rome is a small city so if you value your sleep this is worth bearing in mind. This hotel has clearly decided to restrict the services it offers but to do those that it does offer to a good standard. For example, there is no full scale restaurant, but it does have a charming roof-top piano bar which also serves light meals if you don't, for some reason, fancy exploring the city. We had booked a superior double room for a week (€250/night) and were upgraded to a suit without request, although the hotel was constantly busy during our stay. Overall, whilst I have not stayed elsewhere in Rome, the Marcella Royal compares very well with other hotels I have stayed in in other European capital cities and I would stay there again if I return to Rome. The staff, in particular, made all the difference.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay”
Reviews.Author: MarcEMarc
Reviews.Content: My fiance & I just ended our last 3 nights on a 14 day trip here, and it was fab! The staff is VERY attentive, the property was very nice, extremely clean, and we loved it! We booked a superior room and got a huge suite on the 4th floor corner - it was fantastic! The "light dinner" on the rooftop patio was enchanting, the staff was so friendly! The live piano music playing in the background was a bit dated, but we laughed about it. Definitly would recommend this property!

Reviews.Title: “Book it NOW!”
Reviews.Author: Dynamite
Reviews.Content: Don't less this one get away from you! We loved everything about it! It was first class! I was on a quiet street. The rooms were large and very clean. Eating breakfast on the romantic garden rooftop overlooking the city was spendid. We researched Rome hotels quite extensively and found this to be the best value for the money. Our second choice was 20 Euros less per night, but we checked it out when we were there, and it was nowhere nearly as nice at the Marcella Royal. I doubt you'll find a better deal in Rome.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: A very good hotel to visit. Perfect rooms handy location and more than helpful staff. Breakfast was a pleasure on the roof terrace overlooking the city. Did not try the "light dinners with piano" but found a brilliant local style Trattoria serving the locals in abundance - always a good sign - opposite side of the same block as the Marcella. Just turn left or right and follow the building round to the opposite side. Hope I have not said too much about the Trattoria - the hotel could just not be faulted. Apparently rated 8th out of 85 hotels in a local survey.

Reviews.Title: “All Around”
Reviews.Author: tec10
Reviews.Content: We booked 2 rooms at the Marchella from 4/23-4/26 and absolutely loved it. The staff was exceptional, including Peitro at the front desk who suggested two fabulous restaurants in the area. Our adjoining rooms were a nice size, both with balconies and large bathrooms. The breakfast buffet on the rooftop garden is top notch, with delicious coffee, meats, cheeses and hot american foods. At night the rooftop becomes a romantic place to stop for an after dinner drink, listen to the piano player and overlook the city of Rome. The price was right and the location on a quiet street near all transportation. I cannot say enough about this hideaway except that if you are looking for first class service at second class prices, this should be your hotel of choice.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel, gorgeous food and drink, astouding staff. The perfect place to stay in Rome, I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “The reviews are true”
Reviews.Author: helenjack
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel by reading the reviews of it on this site and they were accurate. The hotel is clean and comfortable. OK the rooms are not huge but certainly adequate and very well appointed. Love the choccie on the pillow each night. Bathroom again a little small but with ample hot water and good pressure in the shower who cares. Staff execptional - all of them - chamber maids, reception, breakfast room and bar. Could not fault any of the staff in any way. Breakfast was good but I found the water for my tea was not quite as hot as I would have liked but I did notice one guest asked for a pot which was bought to her. It is a little further out of the centre than other hotels but you have the station and the bus terminal very close nearby and so it is not an issue. Also being a little further out the restaurants are a little cheaper and it is quieter at night. We were there when the new Pope was voted in and so Rome was packed. Being able to get on bus 62 to the Vatican at the beginning of the line was a real bonus as once further into the centre you had no hope of getting on at all. I walked to allthe major sites and really didn't find the distances too great at all. Enjoyed our stay very much and would recommend the hotel to any one who wants a good quality well priced hotel in Rome.

Reviews.Title: “By far the best Rome hotel we have stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: DaveytNewcastleUK
Reviews.Content: Having stayed in Rome several times usually at the Parco de Principe I was doubtful as to whether this hotel would satisfy us. It surpassed our expectations easily. The rooms don't compare to the 5 star Parco but they are more than adequate, comfortable and very very clean. The staff are efficient but not snooty and superior and they are extremely helpful with organising taxis and restaurants. Breakfast is of a good standard and at night the room is a piano bar, great for an after dinner drink. We will certainly be back here, why go 5 star when you can get 3 nights here instead of one.

Reviews.Title: “Superb Hotel”
Reviews.Author: glogeo
Reviews.Content: Visited Rome for 4 days last week. This hotel was superb. Room nicely decorated and spacious by European standards with queen size double bed. Beautiful, fully tiled bathroom with shower and all facilities including large bowl for shaving etc. , highlighted by spotlight style lighting - very clean. Beds etc. made twice a day and turned down in the evening. Very friendly service at reception and some good recommendations for eating out. Continental breakfast is complimentary- good range of food (inc. bacon and scrambled egg). Breakfast room (which doubles as evening bar) has good views across city. There is no other bar facility - perhaps only slight negative to mention. We are not likely to be back in Rome for a while - seen it, got the tee shirt -but would definitely use this hotel again. One of the best hotels we have visited.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - roof garden fantastic”
Reviews.Author: JK_SurreyUK
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a long weekend in Rome and stayed in Marcella Royal Hotel based on good reviews from this site. Hotel was very clean, staff eceptionally helpful and the roof garden was far nicer than any hotel bar I've had pre-dinner drinks in before. WHy sit inside when you can be out, looking at views over Rome. We had two double rooms booked - and the only negative point was that one only had a shower, no bath - but having said that, the shower was very powerful, and made for a refreshing change! Would certainly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Marcella Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ValGlasgowScotland
Reviews.Content: Deciding on a hotel in Rome was a difficult choice but we saw the reviews on Trip Advisor and chose the Marcella Royal. We loved the hotel. The room was great. The breakfast offered a great choice. We particularly liked the roof garden where we managed to have breakfast twice along with a few other hardy Brits! This would be even better in the summer. The staff were very friendly and efficient. The hotel was also perfectly placed centrally in the city. I would recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Marvellous Marcella Royal”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a short stay in Rome at the Marcella Royal Hotel and we were so pleased with our experience. The staff are uniformly gracious and helpful. The room was very comfortable, spotlessly clean, and well priced. We enjoyed the excellent breakfast on the roof terrace each morning-both the view and the food were delicious. We also liked the location of the hotel which was very central and right by a major bus exchange which made getting around simple. J. Kerr Canada

Reviews.Title: “Michele the Magnificent”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Roma - Marcella Royal Hotel Stayed Tue 15th March 2005 Michele - Concierge We give our highest commendations and thanks to Michele at the Marcella Royal Hotel. He was extremely helpful…he went above & beyond his duties as concierge in assisting us. We truly believe he is of utmost value to Hotel Marcella, as he IS the best concierge we have ever come across! To Michele we owe our sincere gratitude for his outstanding capabilities. He exudes excellence in professionalism. Because of Michele’s efforts we highly recommend the Hotel Marcella to everyone when visiting Roma. As such, we have already arranged a return stay at the hotel. Well done Michele, thank you so very much for helping us with our travel arrangements abroad. You have made our vacanza forever memorable. Sincere gratitude always..

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: hajp
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the Marcella Royal 10th -13th March 2005. the hotel staff were exceptionally friendly and welcoming, and made our first visit to Rome so easy. there was no restaurant at the hotel but the staff recommended several excellent places in the area. the buffet breakfasts in the rooftop bar had a great range of foods, including scrambled egg and bacon! - more than we had expected. it was also lovely to come back at night, have a nightcap in the rooftop bar, and enjoy the view over the city. would certainly recommend hotel and will be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent all round hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: From the moment we entered the Hotel Marcella Royal in Rome we knew we had made a great choice. Everything about this hotel is good - we could not find any faults - a littel bit further than out than the last hotel we stayed at in Rome, but it was good as we found some great places to eat that you would not have found. The staff were always very helpful and ready to answer any questions that we had. The breakfast was the best! hot and cold food on offer and all just great, breakfast room had great views over looking the city. All in all a hotel at a good price - not to be missed. Have already recommended it to friends who are visiting Rome in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Mercella Royal Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have just come back from holiday in Italy. We stayed at Marcella Royal in Rome The Staff was very helpfull. They did every thing to make us feel welcomed. The Reception Staff was excellent went out of the way to help us. Michele was extreamly helpful. He helped us to find all information for our next destination. I would certaily recommend Mercella Royal to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a good location - easy to get round to all of the sights, both on foot and on the underground (which we found was really efficient despite rumours of pickpockets). Hotel room was very good and was kept immaculately clean by the maid. Reception staff are very friendly and helpful. Nothing is too much trouble for them. Buffet breakfast is served in rooftop restaurant which gives good views across the city. There was plenty of choise with the breakfast - both English and conintental. Overall, we would recommend this hotel as a great base to see a wonderful city. John & Lillian, Liverpool, England

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't be more pleased!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the staff at Marcella, especially Michele at the front desk. Our reservation made through Venere.com somehow got lost but Michele came through and was able to secure our party one double and one triple room. Highly recommend Marcella Royal - clean, quiet, convenient location, and great view from the 7th Floor breakfast room and piano bar.

Reviews.Title: “The Staff are a credit to this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Rome: Marcella Royal Hotel Date: February 21, 2005 Reviewer: A TripAdvisor Member, Dublin, Ireland My wife and I have just returned from a three night trip to Rome where we stayed at the Marcella Royal Hotel. The hotel is close to many of the main tourist attractions such as Fontana di Trevi, Piazza Spagna and close but not too close to the Termini Central Station. At the end of the nearby XXI September avenue is the chapel of Santa Maria de la Vittoria, designed by that Baroque genius Bernini, it contains one of his masterpieces "The Ecstasty of Saint Theresa", I mention this as we passed it by a number of times before we went in, typical of Rome as around every corner there is yet another wonderful sight! As mentioned in previous reviews the view over Rome's rooftops towards St.Peters is magnificent as you indulge yourself over a tasty and varied breakfast. We had a standard room which was a little small by northern european standards but typical of Italian hotel rooms, extremely comfortable and clean, we slept well! However this hotels' greatest asset by far is it's staff; front desk, cleaning, and breakfast room all of whom are friendly, helpful and welcoming. Would we return? Yes!

Reviews.Title: “home away from home”
Reviews.Author: slingtraveler
Reviews.Content: This hotel is wonderful!!!! The service and hospitality shown by all the members of its staff made us feel at home and well cared for. In a foreign city where you may not always know what you are doing, the exceptional personal service given to us at the Hotel Marcella made our first trip to Italy an experience we will never forget. I highly recommend this hotel!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely atmosphere.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from 3 nights at the Marcella Royal in Rome. The hotel has a lovely atmosphere and the staff were very friendly and very very helpful especially Alessandro. Every morning he was on hand to help us with information on bus routes, metro routes and directions to the various places of interest. The staff will also book restaurants for you which they recommend. The hotel isn't right in the centre but it was nice not to be in the thick of things and be slightly out. Not too far to catch a bus or metro and you could walk quite easily to the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. Room was lovely and there was a chocolate on the pillow every night as the maid came and turned down the bed for you. We found the breakfast adequate and plenty of choice and typically continental. There are plenty of restaurants close by and we didn't find them any more expensive than back home. One tip maybe to call ahead to the hotel before travelling and they could arrange for a taxi to pick you up from the airport as it cost just the same as getting the train (Leonardo Express) from Fiumicino to the Rome Termini, and then getting a taxi from the Termini to the hotel and it's less hassle. We would definitely recommend this hotel and Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Spotless Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: paul.callan
Reviews.Content: The Marcella Royal Hotel was a really clean hotel. The staff were really nice and really helpfull. The guys at reception recommended some really nice restaurants around rome.

Reviews.Title: “Warm Friendly and very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: donary
Reviews.Content: Beautiful clean and friendly Hotel where nothing is too much bother for staff. We had a triple room which was spotlessly clean and roomy. Although it rained during our trip in February the welcome was warm for us. We hope to return soon. Wonderful memories

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel, in a quieter location”
Reviews.Author: wellmeadowjo
Reviews.Content: Our family (two adults and our nine year old daughter) had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel in February 2005. Although a little away from the main sites (the Trevi Fountain is about a 10 minute walk) the hotel is on two tourist bus routes - one to the Vatican and the other the Colleseum. As its located on a quiet side street the traffic noise is less instrusive too. The hotel itself was clean, comfortable and the staff very friendly and helpful, without being overbearing. There was a good selection at breakfast and the views from the rooftop restaurant were lovely especially as we were fortunate enough to have cold but clear sunny days. We didn't find Rome more expensive than London, about the same, although you will obviously pay more, for even a cofffee at the more tourist cafes. A trip to the Vatican is a must, the climb to the top of the Cupola of St.Peters is worth the effort (we took the elevator for part of the way and were still puffed out) but even in February, all that area is very busy. We would recommend the hotel and Rome without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: Potemarino
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Marcella Royal for six nights in January 2005, and we loved it! Excellent location in a safe area, the hotel was clean, nicely decorated, and well appointed. Mini-bars in every room, roof-top bar and breakfast room with a gorgeous view, even chocolates on your pillow at night! The staff was very polite and helpful. The free internet access meant that we could stay in touch without spending a fortune on long-distance fees. The roof-top restaurant/bar served great food and had a huge assortment of beverages (the hot chocolate was to die for)! Some people on this site have complained about the breakfast, but I found it more than adaquate and very substantial (Scrambled eggs, bacon, bread & toaster to make toast, fruit, yogurt, cold cereals and milk, cheeses & luncheon meats, coffee, teas, and a large assortment of fresh-baked pasteries). If I ever return to Rome, I will definitely stay at the Marcella Royal!

Reviews.Title: “A Good Find.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My Wife and I have just returned from a 4-day trip to Rome. We chose the Marcella Royal Hotel due to the reviews on Trip Adviser; the only two negatives I can put forward are the rooms are quite small and the location. We had a standard room and it was adequate for a short break, but no more. The hotel is in a nice part of Rome but it is a trek from the sites. The nearest tourist attraction is the Spanish Steps, this is a good 15 minutes walk up and down hills! Both of the above are minor niggles rather than anything else. Other than this the hotel was spotlessly clean, the staff fantastic and breakfast good. Overall, we would defiantly recommend it and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Thank You for An Enchanted Summer Vacation”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It all depends upon what you are looking for. If you are looking for a hotel with character both from it's staff and amenities then you will be very happy here. The rooftop bar/restaurant is a wonderful place to end your day or to stop for a cocktail before you go out to dinner. The manager & staff are wonderful because they treat you as a person & not just another tourist. Now, if you are looking for a five star hotel free of any perfection and have the supporting resources, this is not the hotel for you. But if you are looking for perfected character...check out the Marcella Royal.
